item.description:
*UPDATED* Please note the time change. I hope those of you who have already RSVP'd 'yes' are still able to make it.


Hi Everyone,

I hope you are all keeping warm! I'm tentatively scheduling this meetup while looking for an indoor location that can accomodate us. I've including a couple of questions with this meeting invite - please be sure to answer them.

I'm looking forward to this next meetup because I'll be introducing a new member. Pumpkin has a new little sister! She is a 5 month old maltese whose name is PJ. She's been with us for a couple of weeks now, and Pumpkin has certainly taken it upon herself to toughen PJ up for playing hard. And now it's time to introduce PJ to new dogs!

Marjie
item.name: Brrr.... October Meetup
